title: Cardigan
name: Cardigan Coastal Cottages
directions: On the coast road, between Mwnt and Aberporth, near the village of Felinwynt
price: From £35 per night B&B, £300 per week self catering
description: Luxury 12 person farmhouse, offering both B&B and self-catering holidays.  A large, luxury barn cottage sleeping up to 16 and a 2/4 person barn cottage, both available for self-catering breaks.
